price: Allah, yeminlerinizin (kefaretle) çözülmesini size meşru kılmıştır. Allah, sizin mevlanızdır.  O, Alim'dir, Hakim'dir.
arabic: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qad faraḍa al-lahu lakum taḥillata aymānikum wal-lahu mawlākum wahuwa al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
